creditline: Gift of Loren G. Lipson, M.D.
description: tall cylindrical shape, slightly flaring outward toward top, with steep shoulder up to a small mouth opening with one side slightly higher; brick red patina; front has vertical incised design with three forms--from top: dome-shaped form at top with stepped details around edges, rectangle and thinner rectangle with stepped details at bottom edge; center of each form filled with silver leaf with curved incised lines
title: Bomb Pot
